alert.note: Alert for Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 2:06AM MST until February 08 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of an inch or two, with totals increasing to 2 to 5 inches on State Highway 43 near Chief Joseph Pass. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 3 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
